title: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 Founders Edition 8GB

While it lacks ray tracing, its raw performance ensures high frame rates in esports, older AAA titles, and VR experiences, making it ideal for budget-conscious gamers and retro builds. This card shines in compact systems or secondary rigs, with modern connectivity via DisplayPort 1.4 and HDMI 2.0b. Upgrade your rig and enjoy NVIDIA's timeless value and efficiency in a sleek, single-fan blower design that's built to last.

description: Conquer all with the AMD Ryzen 9 7950X, a Zen 4 flagship soaring to 5.7 GHz. With 16 cores and 32 threads, it's a beast for gaming, rendering, and heavy multitasking. Built for AM5 with DDR5 and PCIe 5.0, it's a top-tier choice for power users. No cooler included—equip it with elite cooling to harness its full might for any challenge.

No cooler included—pair it with top-notch cooling to tame this powerhouse.

specifications: Integrated Graphics: AMD Radeon Graphics (2 CUs)

title: Seagate BarraCuda 8TB
description: Expand your storage with the Seagate BarraCuda 8TB, a reliable 3.5-inch HDD built for desktops and NAS. With 5400 RPM and 256MB cache, it offers solid performance for media libraries and backups at a stellar price-per-TB. Its high-density SMR design maximizes capacity, making it a go-to for budget-conscious data hoarders. Quiet and efficient, it's perfect for long-term storage needs.

title: Western Digital Blue 4TB
description: Store with confidence using the Western Digital Blue 4TB, a dependable 3.5-inch HDD for everyday use. Spinning at 5400 RPM with a 256MB cache, it balances capacity and efficiency for desktops or external enclosures. Ideal for photos, videos, and backups, this drive delivers reliable performance at an unbeatable value.

title: Toshiba N300 10TB
description: Power your NAS with the Toshiba N300 10TB, a high-performance 3.5-inch HDD built for 24/7 operation. With 7200 RPM and a 256MB cache, it's optimized for multi-drive environments, delivering fast access for media servers and backups. Its robust design ensures reliability for small businesses or home enthusiasts.

title: Seagate Exos X20 20TB
description: Conquer massive datasets with the Seagate Exos X20 20TB, an enterprise-grade 3.5-inch HDD. Spinning at 7200 RPM with a 256MB cache, it's built for high workloads in data centers or NAS setups. Offering top-tier reliability and capacity, it's the ultimate choice for pros needing vast, dependable storage.

title: Western Digital Red Plus 6TB
description: Keep your NAS humming with the Western Digital Red Plus 6TB, a 3.5-inch HDD tuned for small to medium setups. At 5640 RPM with a 256MB cache, it offers quiet, efficient performance for 24/7 storage. Perfect for home servers or backups, it blends capacity and reliability seamlessly.

description: Strengthen your NAS with the Seagate IronWolf 12TB, a rugged 3.5-inch HDD designed for constant use. With 7200 RPM and a 256MB cache, it delivers fast, reliable storage for multi-user environments. Ideal for home or small office setups needing robust capacity.

description: Master big data with the Toshiba MG08 16TB, an enterprise-class 3.5-inch HDD. At 7200 RPM with a 512MB cache, it's built for high-capacity, high-reliability needs in servers or storage arrays. A powerhouse for professionals demanding top endurance and performance.

title: Western Digital Purple 2TB

title: Seagate SkyHawk AI 18TB

title: Samsung 870 EVO 1TB
